Design Pattern Summary

22 Oct 2013

Delegation Pattern

Delegation allows objects to share behavior without using inheritance and without duplicating code. Delegation decreases the number of responsibilities of an object and their corresponding implementation sizes.

Substitution Pattern

Substitution permits objects to alter (or compose) their implementations on-the-fly at run-time, rather than strictly at compile-time.

Composite Pattern

Strategy Pattern

Decoration Pattern

Factory Pattern

Iterator Pattern
